Pre-Game Insights: A high-stakes Asian derby to inch closer to the semis
India is riding high on a 47-run victory over AFG
Bangladesh enters after a 28-run loss by DLS method to Australia
India's leading scorers are Rohit Sharma (454 runs) and Yuzvendra Chahal (9 wickets)
Bangladesh's leading scorers are Sabbir Rahman (236 runs) and Al-Amin Hossain (8 wickets)
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is scheduled for Saturday, June 22, 2024, at 8 pm IST
The fixture will take place at the Sir Vivian Richards Stadium, North Sound, Antigua
A testing batting track is expected
Hitman is set to surpass the 500-run mark in T20Is against Bangladesh
Jasprit Bumrah is expected to weave his magic again
IND's batting will face the threat of Mustafizur Rahman's bowling variations
